Html: Hello how can i retrieve the signal strenght in dbm en not percentage

Based on this example (http://managedwifi.codeplex.com/SourceControl/changeset/view/41381)

Wlan.WlanAvailableNetwork[] networks = wlanIface.GetAvailableNetworkList(0);

Wlan.WlanBssEntry[] redes = wlanIface.GetNetworkBssList(); //Get the atribute that you need

foreach (Wlan.WlanBssEntry network in redes)
{
 Console.Write("Network SSID {0} RSSI {1}\n ", GetStringForSSID(network.dot11Ssid),
 network.rssi);
 }  

Vitor Madureira Sales
Ciência da Computação - UFV
